segment.source: A simple and effective tool for managing customer records in beauty salons and other businesses
segment.target: Et enkelt og effektivt værktøj til at administrere kunderegistre i skønhedssaloner og andre virksomheder

segment.source: Bee O’clock is a unique management tool allowing your customers to book and pay for your services. You can also keep track of your performance to become the best version of yourself.
segment.target: Bee O’clock er et unikt ledelsesværktøj, der giver dine kunder mulighed for at booke og betale for dine tjenester. Du kan også holde styr på din præstation for at blive den bedste version af dig selv.

segment.source: appointment, calendar, clients, business, management, tool, bookkeeping, tax planning, event management, delegate, time-consuming tasks, empower, professionals, reduce stress, increase productivity, eliminate distractions, frustrations, running a business
segment.target: Bee O’clock, ledelsesværktøj, tjenester, præstation, version

segment.source: Forget about confusion with records. Our service automates customer onboarding processes, allowing you to focus on your work, not on record administration.
segment.target: Glem alt om forvirring med registreringer. Vores service automatiserer onboarding-processer for kunder, så du kan fokusere på dit arbejde, ikke på administration af journaler.

segment.source: Make sure your customers always remember their visit! Automatic SMS and email reminders will ensure that your clients arrive on time and reduce the number of missed appointments.
segment.target: Sørg for, at dine kunder altid husker deres besøg! Automatiske SMS- og e-mail-påmindelser sikrer, at dine kunder kommer til tiden og reducerer antallet af ubesvarede aftaler.

segment.source: Make Bee o'clock a part of your brand! You can customize each interface of the service to your style and brand, which allows you to individualize your workflows.
segment.target: Gør Bee o'clock til en del af dit brand! Du kan tilpasse hver grænseflade i tjenesten til din stil og dit brand, hvilket giver dig mulighed for at individualisere dine arbejdsgange.

segment.source: All information is at your fingertips - you can access customer history, schedules, and records from any device. You can make decisions anywhere and anytime.
segment.target: Alle oplysninger er lige ved hånden - du kan få adgang til kundehistorik, tidsplaner og optegnelser fra enhver enhed. Du kan træffe beslutninger hvor som helst og når som helst.
